==Limitations==
==Limitations==
â
Because of the hardware compatibility limitations inherent in Gobuntu the release carries a note from Canonical:
+
Because some [[Device driver|drivers]], [[firmware]], and "[[binary blobs]]" were removed from Gubuntu, it will run on less computers than ubuntu:
<blockquote>Please note that because running Gobuntu on most laptops and many desktops will be difficult, Gobuntu is intended for experienced Linux enthusiasts at this time.<ref name="gobuntu1"> {{cite web|url = http://www.ubuntu.com/products/whatisubuntu/gobuntu|title = Gobuntu|accessdate = 2008-04-13|last = Canonical Ltd.|authorlink = |year = 2007}}</ref></blockquote>
<blockquote>Please note that because running Gobuntu on most laptops and many desktops will be difficult, Gobuntu is intended for experienced Linux enthusiasts at this time.<ref name="gobuntu1"> {{cite web|url = http://www.ubuntu.com/products/whatisubuntu/gobuntu|title = Gobuntu|accessdate = 2008-04-13|last = Canonical Ltd.|authorlink = |year = 2007}}</ref></blockquote>
